docs.title: Lyceum Vault
docs.text:
Welcome to my public knowledge space — a living notebook where I publish my projects, documentation, and essays.

What is this site?

This site is built with MkDocs + Material, deployed on GitHub Pages. Content is plain Markdown so I can draft in Obsidian and publish here easily.

docs.title: Highlights
docs.text:
• Projects: DSL inference app, Lyceum Workbench (Linux + automation + music)
  • Notes: Practical guides (Fedora Samba, Fcitx5, PreSonus cancel guide)
  • Essays: Education narratives, culture/tech reflections

Repo: https://github.com/leo-nakayama/lyceum-vault

docs.title: Education Narrative Structure (Notes)
docs.text:
Exploring how narratives of sacrifice/virtue are embedded in education and public memory. Draft pointers:

  • Telos differences: community preservation vs individual completion
  • Risks of beautified sacrifice narratives in curriculum
  • Comparative framing with popular culture (e.g., anime) and memorial sites

WIP outline; fuller essay to be published here.

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Install: sudo apt install fcitx5 fcitx5-mozc
  2. Set input method: im-config -n fcitx5 (logout/login)
  3. Ensure env: bash echo $XMODIFIERS echo $GTK_IM_MODULE echo $QT_IM_MODULE
  4. Autostart if needed: ~/.config/autostart/fcitx5.desktop

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
• If tray icon missing: verify fcitx5 is installed and running
  • Wayland notes: prefer recent KDE Plasma versions

docs.title: Server (SELinux + permissions)
docs.text:
# Label share dir
sudo semanage fcontext -a -t samba_share_t "/srv/share(/.*)?"
sudo restorecon -Rv /srv/share

# Group + ACLs
sudo chgrp -R sambausers /srv/share
sudo chmod -R 2775 /srv/share
sudo setfacl -R -m g:sambausers:rwx /srv/share

docs.title: smb.conf (snippet)
docs.text:
[share]
   path = /srv/share
   browsable = yes
   writable = yes
   valid users = @sambausers
   force group = sambausers
   create mask = 0664
   directory mask = 2775

docs.title: How to Cancel PreSonus Studio One Annual Subscription (Hidden Step)
docs.text:
If the “Cancel Membership” button doesn’t appear in MyPreSonus:

  1. Go to My Products → Software → Studio One → Activations
  2. Delete all licensed devices (deactivate registered computers)
  3. Wait ~10–60 minutes for backend sync
  4. Then go to Account → Membership & Billing → Cancel Membership

Note

The cancel button only appears once no devices remain linked to the subscription.

docs.title: DSL Inference App
docs.text: A Flask/CLI toolkit that runs my custom DSL modules (AristotleFourCauses, SyntheticNaikan, etc.).

docs.title: Goals
docs.text:
• Encode reasoning patterns as operators and pipelines
  • Run locally with Python; optional LLM backends
  • Reproducible, testable workflows

docs.title: Status
docs.text: • WIP: Sketching module interfaces and evaluation harness

docs.title: Lyceum Workbench
docs.text: My multi-machine lab: g16 (desktop), e14 (laptop), m900 (server). Focused on Linux automation, backups, and creative workflows.

docs.title: Areas
docs.text:
• Storage tiers (hot/warm/cold), LVM, rsync/borg
  • Samba + ACLs; remote access; CI/CD for home lab
  • Music stack (LilyPond, Python Euclidean rhythms)
